name: Global Summit on Civil, Architectural and Environmental Engineering
content: It is our pleasure to cordially invite you to join us as an Invited Speaker at the Global Summit on Civil, Architectural and Environmental Engineering (GSCAEE2021)‚Äù will be held during July 19-21, 2021 in Barcelona, Spain. This meeting will be a great occasion for discussions of previous, present, and future research on Civil, Architectural and Environmental Engineering. We strongly believe that your participation in this meeting would be a great opportunity for fellow attendees to discuss various challenges and objectives in this field.
